name: tweet/recycle
body: There are two datasets used for recycling. (1) The dataset on 'Land & Environment' (2018) from the Australian Bureau of Statistics presents information in the following specified areas of land and environment: land Area, protected land areas and solar installations. (2) The dataset on 'Agriculture Commodities' (2016) from The Agricultural Census dataset presents the estimations of agricultural commodity values. (2)

name: tweet/solar
body: The dataset is acquired from the Australian Bureau of Statistics on 'Land & Environment' (2018). The dataset presents information in the following specified areas of land and environment: land Area, protected land areas and solar installations. Solar installation is considered to have a positive impact on the environment since solar does not release harmful gasses in the environment (Solar energy and the environment - U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA), 2022).

name: tweet/electric
body: The dataset used is 'Number of Motor Vehicle by Dweling Census' (2016). The dataset describes the count of occupied private dwellings categorized by the number of registered motor vehicles owned or used by household members.
